body: Thank you for responding for me, Mostapha.  The last few days have been pretty busy.  I have attached a GH definition that shows how to use my solar fan and envelope components.  I would suggest opening the GH definition with a weather file that does not generate too many sun vectors for the criteria that I list in the sunpath conditional statement.  If more than 500 vectors are being used to construct the solar fan or envelope, the calculation can take upwards of a minute.  Let me know if you have any other questions, Petar.
